alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Erie and eastern Crawford Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Girard to near Riceville to 9 miles west of Sugarcreek. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Very heavy rain is reducing visibilities and motorists should be alert for rapidly changing conditions. Ponding of water on roadways is also likely. Locations impacted include... Erie, Corry, Edinboro, Titusville, North East, Union City, Girard, Waterford, Wattsburg, Canadohta Lake, Riceville, Northwest Harborcreek, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Lake City, Cochranton and Hydetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
